fulltext:
TRAM TRAN (Ms.) 
Email: tranbichtram.87@gmail.com    Contact No.: (+84)-902-465-325 
MARKETING MANAGER 
Dynamic, fact-based analytical mind, result-oriented marketing professional with over 9-year 
experience in strategic planning, developing and rolling out marketing strategy with the ability to read 
into consumers’ insight and market trends using marketing communication skills. 
Proven ability to drive record-high marketing campaign and roll out successful product launch. 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
QSR VIETNAM – Jan 2015 to present 
(No. 1 F&B Franchise Company in Vietnam) 
MARKETING MANAGER 
• Take care of 5 brands: Dairy Queen, DQ Grill & Chill, Buffalo Wild Wings (aka. B-Dubs), The Pizza 
Company and Swensen’s brands. In-charged of developing brand strategy, marketing planning and 
implementing nation-wide campaigns for all brands. 
o Internal:  
§ Conduct market research to identify new trends and opportunities in the market to 
come up with new product innovations, new campaign ideas to generate sales.  
§ Lead design team in artwork developments and ensure all are within brand 
guidelines.  
§ Lead brand marketing team in marketing campaign, from beginning to end, including 
campaign idea, launch out and post campaign analysis.  
§ Coordinate with respective departments (Operations, R&D, Supply Chain, 
Accounting, IT, Site Development, etc) to ensure the Excellent in Operation of all the 
brands.  
§ Responsible for budget allocation, effective spending and the overall performance of 
brands to report directly to the Board.  
§ Coach team members to ensure 100% on-target performance.  
o External: 
§ Work with franchisor in all brand initiatives (yearly marketing campaign, new 
product developments and other activities). 
§ Lead and monitor external advertising agencies.  
§ Identify and explore new business opportunities, such as tie-up with other business 
partners, developing new business platform and exploring new streams of revenue 
for the business.   
• Expand QSR’s franchise portfolio by bringing successful international brands into Vietnam. Lead all 
the dealings with Franchisor, regarding market opportunities, brand strategy when entering 
Vietnam, menu development and roll-out plan.  
Selected Accomplishments:  
• The Pizza Company: 
o Build The Pizza Company as number 1 pizza brand in Vietnam. 
o Year-on-year sales double, store network increased by 12 times (from 3 stores to 50 
stores) in only 3 years.  
• Buffalo Wild Wings (B-Dubs) 
o Transform the business by utilizing 3rd party platform to drive sales. 
o Build B-Dubs as one-of-a-kind entertaining experience in Vietnam by cooperating with 
lifestyles brands.  
• Successfully generate new stream of revenue for the company without any investment. 
WALL STREET ENGLISH CO. LTD. – Jan 2014 to Jan 2015 
(World-wide Chain of English center) 
BRAND MANAGER 
 In-charged of leading creative team and creative agencies for content direction and developing 
integrated communication plan, incorporating PR, Marketing and Social activities.  
Selected Accomplishments:  
• Increased lead-to-sales conversion rate by 20% by optimizing channels and fine-tune content 
direction. 
• Achieved a strong and visible brand presence across various media channels, including traditional 
media (press, telemarketing, OOH) and digital channels. 
• Successfully launched the 2nd and 3rd center of Wall Street English, with more than 3000 attendant 
and hit 110% sales target in 3 consecutive months (Sep, Oct, Nov 2014). 
VIET THAI INTERNATIONAL JSC. – Apr 2012 – Jan 2014 
(Multimillion dollar business of Vietnamese F&B Brand – Highlands Coffee and Pho 24) 
BRAND MANAGER – HIGHLANDS COFFEE 
• Worked closely with General Manager to build short and long term marketing strategy for 
Highlands Coffee.  
• Directed new product launch. Initiated and executed brand building campaigns and promotional 
campaigns.  
Selected Accomplishments:  
• Strategically re-position Highlands Coffee as a Vietnamese Coffee chain. Initiate 3rd-generation 
Highlands store concept with the pay-and-claim service type, which helped to jump start the brand 
to a whole new level.  
• Led the development of Highlands’ famous Coffee Freeze. Successfully launch the product to signify 
Highlands as an inspiring Vietnamese Coffee chain.  
• Led the Festive Campaign, cooperated with Ford, Piaggio and Nokia to the biggest promotional 
campaign in F&B – allowing customers to have a chance to win a Ford car at Highlands Coffee.  
EDUCATION 
• Singapore Management University 
Bachelor of Business Management – Double Degree in Marketing and Finance 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)

educations.major_categories_detail: Tài chính – Ngân hàng – Bảo hiểm
